title: Diamond Pendant - Modern Thali Bottu Design
materials: set with meticulously cut White Diamonds (VS Clarity
G Color). Features a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Thali Bottu, this pendant features a graceful, layered design. The rose gold provides a warm contrast to the dazzling diamonds. The design includes a flower motif set with a cluster of diamonds to highlight the design.
occasions: or as a sophisticated addition to bridal wear. Suitable as a modern Thali for weddings.
description: A modern and delicate update to the traditional Thali Bottu. This pendant beautifully blends tradition with contemporary style, offering a unique piece that's both meaningful and fashionable. The diamond quality ensures brilliance and lasting value.
